english_translation: It is good if there are no weeds in the grassland.

english_transliteration: Hāgendu kaḷe barade māri namma iṣṭa ?
english_translation: But does the weed not come, defying our wish?

kannada_original: ಬಂದ ಕಳೆ ಕೀಳುವುದು ಇದೆ ನಮ್ಮ ಕೈಯಲ್ಲಿ ;
english_transliteration: Banda kaḷe kīḷuvudu ide namma kaiyalli ;
english_translation: Pulling the weed that came is in our hands.
You remove the inner weed – Dear Rāma.
